title: NVL grid showdown!
text:
Saturday, October 17, 2015 8:05 AM EDT 
NVL grid showdown! Browse for Republican American Reprints Are you ready for a great night of showdown football? Well, there is one game that certainly meets that criteria and the weather will be ideal for football, crisp and dry. Torrington hosts Wolcott in as big a NVL clash in Torrington as there has been in many years. Now, on The Zone is extensive coverage of the big game. Check out the lineups, listen to the players, get predictions and analysis ... and you vote on which team you think will win. Go here for full coverage of Wolcott at Torrington. More Stories About: NVL , football
